pages.text: Long ago, $(l:)Witch Hunters$() realized that a great advantage of Witches was their use of $(l:constructs/poppets/poppets)Poppets$(/l) combined with $(l:constructs/poppets/poppet_shelf)Poppet Shelves$(/l).$(br)Hunters developed a rudimental but effective way to localize such devices with the goal of destroying them.
The Poppet Shelf Compass illuminates its crystals the closer the Witch Hunter gets to a Poppet Shelf.
